metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14378 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
ip_reass in ip_input.c in libslirp 4.0.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow via a large packet because it mishandles a case involving the first fragment. It was discovered that a heap-based buffer overflow existed in the SLiRP networking implementation of QEMU. A local attacker in a guest could use this to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code in the host.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

qemu - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-block-extra - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-guest-agent - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-kvm - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-arm - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-common - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-mips - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-misc - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-ppc - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-s390x - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-sparc - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-system-x86 - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-user - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-user-binfmt - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-user-static - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
qemu-utils - 1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> located in slirp/src/ip_input.c in qemu

criterions.comment: basilisk2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
bochs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
fs-uae package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qemu package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu7.20').
slirp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vde2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
